Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/89th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 90th, and Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 90th, and Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/89th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at Commercial/89th.
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 90th, Houston, 89th, and Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 90th, Houston, 89th, and Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/89th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
